Text:
This isn't a screener and the quality is actually quite good. But the movie was made for hidef viewing so a 720 version would be better. There is nothing wrong with this one save that there are no subtitles just for the Navi dialogue; you turn on subtitles and it's for the whole movie.

In any case, thanks AITB for sharing this.

It may be from a p2p DVDR called "Avatar.(2009).DVDR.PAL-CaLLiOpeD [EN/HU/TR]".

This is the nuke message for the Avatar.2009.PAL.MULTI.DVDR-TED scene copy of that DVDR

bad.nfo
reencoded.dvd9.to.dvd5
not.untouched.video
undersized
modified.volume.label
low.bitrate
repacked.from.web

So basically the problem would be that the DVD source is reencoded

!!!WARNING!!!
It's ONCE again that effing screener...
Mislabeled and sh1t.

BEWARE.
VERY VERY LOW Quality.

Wait 2 more weeks for true BRrip/BDrip
Avatar release date: 22 April
